item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 19, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Postgres as a VectorDB GUI (28 points | 2 comments)
2. Solaar is a Linux manager for many Logitech keyboards, mice, and other devices (289 points | 129 comments)
3. Half My Life with Perl – By Randal Schwartz (34 points | 1 comment)
4. Self-sorting arrays reveal unexpected competencies in minimal intelligence (62 points | 8 comments)
5. Embedding Lua in Sqleibniz with Rust (38 points | 1 comment)
6. ISO 8583: The language of credit cards (220 points | 34 comments)
7. Cultural Evolution of Cooperation Among LLM Agents (224 points | 111 comments)
8. Firenvim – Turn the browser into a Neovim client (6 points | 1 comment)
9. The RAM Myth (48 points | 17 comments)
10. Launch HN: Innate (YC F24) – Home robots as easy to program as AI agents (120 points | 58 comments)
11. Piccolo OS, a Small Multitasking OS for the Raspberry Pi Pico (22 points | discuss)
12. Automotive Grade Linux Launches New Expert Group Led by Toyota (13 points | 1 comment)
13. Our brains create mental "chapters" with new event segmentation study (30 points | 2 comments)
14. Torpedo juice: Legendary, illegal WWII liquor drunk in Alaska and the world (9 points | 4 comments)
15. Updates to H-1B (284 points | 789 comments)
16. Exposing the Clearingstelle Urheberrecht Im Internet (CUII) (6 points | discuss)
17. There's No Such Thing as Software Productivity (2012) (63 points | 53 comments)
18. Windshield pitting incidents in Washington reach fever pitch on April 15, 1954 (2003) (254 points | 190 comments)
19. Apple Watch with Android (131 points | 73 comments)
20. Corvus Robotics (YC S18) is hiring a Head of Software to help inventory drones ( | hide)
21. I Built a Figma Plugin That Generates Custom SVG Illustrations with AI (19 points | 4 comments)
22. Genesis – a generative physics engine for general-purpose robotics (8 points | 3 comments)
23. Advanced Civilizations Could Be Indistinguishable from Nature (42 points | 20 comments)
24. Formally Modeling Dreidel, the Sequel (81 points | 22 comments)
25. "The Custer Wolf is Dead." (1921) [pdf] (36 points | 6 comments)
26. Moon (2837 points | 235 comments)
27. Java in the Small (207 points | 142 comments)
28. Error Stacking in Rust (25 points | 7 comments)
29. Consider the Shipwreck: Ten Books on Maritime Disasters and Ecological Collapse (14 points | 2 comments)
30. CDC confirms first severe human case of bird flu in U.S. (157 points | 49 comments)
